title: pancamAtanga mukha
sahitya:
pancamAtanga mukha gaNapatinA paripAlitOham sumukhEna shrI


anupallavi

 panca bhUtAtmaka prapancOdayAdi karaNa virinci hari rudra nutEna pancavaktra shivasutEna


caraNam   varadAbhaya pAsha shrNi kapAla danta mOdaka mudgarAkSa mAlAkarENa 
kamalApura vihArENa puruhUtAdyakhila dEva pUjita vighnEshvarENa vara guruguha 
sOdarENa surucira lambOdarENa karuNAnga gauratarENa kalimalaharaNa tarENa
